participant_1.background:

i am the youngest of 4 children.
Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling.

participant_2.background:
I now use my artistic talents to create games that promote animal welfare.
i enjoy eating italian food.
I enjoy listening to music and thinking about my next move.
I'm afraid that my students will fail to learn and grow.
I used to go clubbing every weekend, but now I prefer to stay home with my family and pug.

content.text: Doing well, thanks for asking! What about you?
I'm doing alright. Just finished a game jam and I'm really happy with how it turned out.
Oh awesome! What kind of game did you make?
It's a puzzle game about saving animals from extinction.
That sounds really cool! I love animals.
Thanks! Me too. I used to be a teacher, but I now use my artistic talents to create games that promote animal welfare.
That's amazing! I'm glad that you found a way to combine your love of animals with your artistic talents.
Thanks! It was a natural fit for me. I love helping animals and I love to create games.
What was your favorite part of being a teacher?
My favorite part was seeing my students learn and grow. I loved being able to help them reach their full potential.
That's so great! I'm sure you were a great teacher.
Thank you! I like to think so.
Well, I'm glad that you're doing well now. It sounds like you're really happy with your current career.
I am! I'm really passionate about my work and I'm grateful that I can make a difference in the world.
That's awesome! I'm glad that you're happy.
